item.title: Cisco ACI â€“ NX-OS Style CLI
item.description: Cisco introduced a NX-OS like CLI for the Cisco ACI Solution with release 1.2(1i). In this post i will demonstrate some of the things that can be achieved through the NX-OS CLI. !Important! There is no safety net, if you issue something like ‘no tenant XXX’ the configuration is gone! No commit, warning or similar! !Important! Basics The NX-OS like CLI is the new default if you connect via SSH to the APIC
